rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
父母过早接触吸烟会增加多发性硬化症的风险《神经病学、神经外科与精神病学杂志》在线发表的一项研究发现，减少童年时期父母吸烟的机会可能会降低那些有遗传倾向的人患 MS（多发性硬化症）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Early-exposure-to-parental-smoking-linked-to-higher-MS-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Early-exposure-to-parental-smoking-linked-to-higher-MS-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13204c31-1b1c-4a22-8df4-8a1f70c0b541 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:35:15 -0500 Early exposure to parental smoking linked to higher MS risk
优质早餐可降低心血管疾病风险吃一顿优质早餐可以为一天提供适量的能量（约占每日摄入量的四分之一），可以降低患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Quality-breakfast-reduces-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Quality-breakfast-reduces-the-risk-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=286ff8fb-6ccf-4cf9-a508-3bceb5d52f3d Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:24:18 -0500 Quality breakfast reduces the risk of cardiovascular disease
研究揭示肠道微生物组在血糖敏感性中的个体特异性作用研究揭示了个体肠道微生物群对高碳水化合物饮食的反应如何影响血糖敏感性，为个性化营养铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-reveals-gut-microbiomee28099s-person-specific-role-in-glycemic-sensitivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-reveals-gut-microbiomee28099s-person-specific-role-in-glycemic-sensitivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f99712d0-e3a3-47a6-8c23-b0542abc7250 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:17:00 -0500 Study reveals gut microbiome’s person-specific role in glycemic sensitivity
较高的心肺健康可改善老年人的认知功能《英国运动医学杂志》在线发表的研究发现，老年人较高的心肺健康水平与认知能力的几个核心方面的保存有关，而这些方面容易受到与年龄相关的衰退的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Higher-cardiorespiratory-fitness-improves-cognitive-function-in-older-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Higher-cardiorespiratory-fitness-improves-cognitive-function-in-older-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e275bc05-931f-47e2-9f22-7d029faadf45 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 07:02:02 -0500 Higher cardiorespiratory fitness improves cognitive function in older age
低镁摄入量被认为是心血管疾病的关键因素镁摄入不足是心血管疾病发生的关键因素，因此需要提高认识并改善饮食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Low-magnesium-intake-identified-as-a-key-factor-in-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Low-magnesium-intake-identified-as-a-key-factor-in-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e62b3911-4649-4dc1-b34a-c319825deed5 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 06:54:00 -0500 Low magnesium intake identified as a key factor in cardiovascular disease
世卫组织敦促采取公平行动消除疟疾负担世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的新数据显示，自 2000 年以来，估计已避免了 22 亿疟疾病例和 1,270 万人死亡，但该疾病仍然是严重的全球健康威胁，特别是在世界卫生组织非洲区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/WHO-urges-equitable-action-to-end-malaria-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/WHO-urges-equitable-action-to-end-malaria-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b609a58f-e5fe-47bd-89fb-d39d24f31dd0 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 06:43:23 -0500 WHO urges equitable action to end malaria burden
疱疹感染影响全球 8.46 亿人根据今天发布的最新估计，年龄在 15 岁至 49 岁之间的约 8.46 亿人患有生殖器疱疹感染，占全球这一年龄段人口的五分之一以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Herpes-infections-affect-846-million-people-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Herpes-infections-affect-846-million-people-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c1ca0ca-7637-4d61-a92a-12dc738ac45c Wed, 11 Dec 2024 06:30:47 -0500 Herpes infections affect 846 million people worldwide
有毒的“永久化学物质”污染了加州农村的饮用水，远离已知来源三年前，胡安娜·瓦莱 (Juana Valle) 在加利福尼亚州圣胡安包蒂斯塔 (San Juan Bautista) 购买了 5 英亩的农场，她从未想过自己会害怕喝自来水或吃新鲜的鸡蛋和核桃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Toxic-e28098forever-chemicalse28099-taint-rural-California-drinking-water-far-from-known-sources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Toxic-e28098forever-chemicalse28099-taint-rural-California-drinking-water-far-from-known-sources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2488075-b4da-4077-b3b9-da33125bee89 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 06:01:47 -0500 Toxic ‘forever chemicals’ taint rural California drinking water, far from known sources
蒙大拿州前卫生工作人员斥责监督规则是医院的“愿望清单”蒙大拿州一名前卫生部门工作人员自称是审查非营利性医院慈善行为立法的主要起草人，他表示，实施该法案的新规则相当于医院的“愿望清单”，该州需要重新制定计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Former-Montana-health-staffer-rebukes-oversight-rules-as-a-hospital-e28098wish-liste28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Former-Montana-health-staffer-rebukes-oversight-rules-as-a-hospital-e28098wish-liste28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5f90503-58c8-410d-9fdd-be82112d05b1 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 05:56:56 -0500 Former Montana health staffer rebukes oversight rules as a hospital ‘wish list’
梅奥诊所研究人员提倡跨血统进行全面的 TPMT 基因分型梅奥诊所的研究人员发现，TPMT*8 等位基因的基因变异与硫嘌呤类药物的代谢减少有关。 TPMT*8 在非洲人或非裔美国人后裔中相对常见。爱思唯尔发表在《分子诊断杂志》上的一项新研究详细介绍了研究人员的目标，即提供可在临床上用于预测对所有患者有益的药物反应的药物基因组测试，无论其祖先背景如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Mayo-Clinic-researchers-advocate-for-compressive-TPMT-genotyping-across-ancestries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Mayo-Clinic-researchers-advocate-for-compressive-TPMT-genotyping-across-ancestries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4db1eb9d-f0f4-4d12-bc42-57bc2458636f Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:51:43 -0500 Mayo Clinic researchers advocate for comprehensive TPMT genotyping across ancestries
